EmailTemplate.name: OP-202304-xSeg-SVB Transfer Notification.08. Livongo Lockbox
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Remittance Update - New Lockbox Address
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reference Number: {{member.Program Member Custom Field 2:default=edit me}}
Dear Client,
As you are aware, we are moving our banking relationship to J.P. Morgan. Please transfer paper check payments to our new lockbox account with J.P. Morgan before your next billing cycle.
All payments should be directed to J.P. Morgan by September 1, 2023.
Lockbox Name JPM Bank Acct W9 USPS Mailing Address Courier Address
Livongo Health, Inc.
JPM Bank Acct: xxxxx9929
Lockbox Number: 24004
Livongo Health, Inc W9 <https://go1.teladochealth.com/rs/138-DRH-707/images/03 W9 2023 Livongo.pdf>
Livongo Health, Inc. PO Box 24004 New York, NY 10087-4004
J.P. Morgan Chase – Lockbox Processing Attn: Livongo Health, Inc. / Box # 24004 4 Chase Metrotech Center 7th Floor East Brooklyn, NY 11245
Please note this is for membership and consult fee payments only. Claims remitted via payors will go to a separate company as they do today. We will be reaching out to those payors directly.
Our preference is that all payments going forward are transacted electronically. To receive our J.P. Morgan ACH/Wire banking details, please contact the Teladoc Billing Support team at clientremitsupport@teladochealth.com <[[mailto:clientremitsupport@teladochealth.com]]> or call 888-260-4425 Monday to Friday, 8am – 5pm CST. Please have your reference number available to assist us in providing the correct banking information.
Please continue to send remittance information to payments@teladochealth.com <[[mailto:payments@teladochealth.com]]>.
Thank you in advance for your assistance with this transition.
Richard J. Napolitano Chief Accounting Officer Teladoc Health, Inc.
